product.name: Stainless Steel Litter Box with Lid, XL Extra Large Enclosed Cat Litter Box Fits All Cats Modular Design with Flip Cover, Top Entry Metal High Sided Cat Box & Pedal & Scoop, Anti-Leakage (Black)
product.description:
We offer cat litter box with ample space, accommodating even larger breeds.
Removable components simplifying the cleaning process.
A happy and contented cat starts with a suitable cat litter box.
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Does cat mess get into the seam between the walls and box?
No, it won't. The stainless steel and plastic shells are a tight fit.
Are litter boxes and all types of cat litter compatible?
Yes, our litter boxes are made of sturdy 304 stainless steel that is durable and corrosion-resistant. We recommend use less dusty litter, it is absorbent, deodorizes well and provides a healthy clean environment for your cat.
Is this litter box set easy to remove and wash?
Yes, you just need to remove the top cover and the cover on the stainless steel upwards and rinse it off!
product.bullet_points:
• 【Preferred 304 Stainless Steel】Unlike plastic litter boxes, the high quality and sturdy stainless steel litter box lid prevents odors, is more durable and easier to clean, and can even last up to 5+ years of service life. The stainless steel litter box with the included anti-slip sticker ensures that your cat won't shift or tip over when digging
• 【Suitable For All Cats】The XL cat litter box with lid measures 24" * 15.8" * 15.4" and has an a large capacity of 65L for all cats weighing 1-30 lbs. The 6" deep covered litter box holds up to 38L of litter, which is enough for an adult cat to use for about 25-30 days. Say goodbye to constant litter changes and enjoy peace of mind while you're away
• 【Fast Cleaning】Our innovative 110° flip-top lid allows for effortless scooping without the need to completely remove the lid, saving you time and effort. When it's time for a thorough clean, the removable design enables easy access and thorough sweeping, ensuring a sanitary environment for your beloved pet. Plus, the wooden handle provides a comfortable grip for hassle-free cleaning
• 【Customizable and Versatile Design】Our extra large cat litter box features a versatile design that can be easily customized to suit your cat's size and preferences. Whether your furry friend prefers an enclosed or semi-enclosed cat litter box, our easy-to-assemble design supports multiple configurations. The high sided enclosure cat litter box ensures privacy and prevents litter scatter, while the semi-enclosed option promotes ventilation and simplifies cleaning
• 【Dual Entry Option】Designed with a flexible front door and a top exit for cats to move around more easily and comfortably, with a filter pedal that not only collects litter from cats' paws, keeping floors clean and saving on litter usage, but also makes it easier for older or short-legged cats to access the metal litter box
• 【Convenience And Service】Our top entry litter box kit includes: stainless steel litter box, two plastic trays, scoop, storage box and filter pedal. APHYXEN stainless steel cat litter box grows with your beloved cat, if you find the product scratches or logistics dents, please message us and we will reply within 24 hours
